function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Limited access to basic services and public health interventions","Impact":"Uncontrolled disease spread, higher mortality rates, and increased burden on healthcare systems","Mitigation":"Improving access to basic services, implementing public health interventions, and decentralizing resources to cities","Technologies":"Digital platforms for resource management and communication, data analytics for urban planning and resource allocation","People":"Local communities, especially in resource-constrained areas","Owner":"Local government and municipal authorities"},{"Description":"Lack of coordination and partnerships with local community structures and authorities","Impact":"Ineffective emergency response, lack of support for local efforts, and disconnected communication channels","Mitigation":"Establishing partnerships and networks with local community structures and authorities, engaging in regular dialogue with city authorities","Technologies":"Digital collaboration platforms, communication tools for real-time updates, and community engagement apps","People":"Local community structures, leaders, and authorities","Owner":"International networks and agencies"}]}
